member.name: BINDSPEED
member.summary: Indicates approximately how long the caller will wait to bind to an object.

member.name: BINDSPEED.BINDSPEED_INDEFINITE
member.summary: There is no time limit on the binding operation.

summary.para: The binding operation must be completed in a moderate amount of time.
If this flag is specified, the implementation of should return MK_E_EXCEEEDEDDEADLINE unless tone of the following is true:

item.description: The object is already in the running state.
The object is a pseudo-object (an object internal to the item container, such as a cell-range in a spreadsheet or a character-range in a word processor).

The object is supported by an in-process server (so it is always in the running state when it is loaded). In this case, should load the designated object, and, if the function indicates that the object is running, return successfully.

member.name: BINDSPEED.BINDSPEED_IMMEDIATE
member.summary: The caller will wait only a short time. In this case, the binding operation should return MK_E_EXCEEEDEDDEADLINE unless the object is already in the running state or is a pseudo-object.
